title: OCE Down?
body: Am still in game, but had a small dc of everyone in the game, and then 2 minutes later, dc'ed for about 5 minutes now.

replies.body:
If your unsure if there is an server issue then result to one of the following site depending where you are:
For the OCE Region: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce
For the NA Region: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na
For the EU West Region: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw
For the EU Nordic & East Region: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eunu
For the Latin America North Region: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#lan
For the Latin America South Region: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#las
For the Brazil Region: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#br
For the Turkey Region: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#tr
For the Russia Region: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#ru
